basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Piscicola, Clostridia butyricum, Enterococcus faecium, Enterococcus faecalis, Lactobacillus curvatus, Lactobacillus casei, Lactobacillus sakeii, L. raffinolactis, Leuconostoc mesenteroides, Listeria innocua, Listeria monocytogenes, Pediococcus acidilactici, P. pentosaceus.
